meanings.definition: Having a brindled or streaked coat.
meanings.sent1: The brinded cat had stripes of different colors on its fur.
meanings.sent2: The dog's brinded fur made it stand out in the park.
meanings.sent3: The brinded horse looked like a walking rainbow with its colorful coat.
meanings.sent4: Her brinded scarf added a touch of uniqueness to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The brinded butterfly fluttered gracefully among the flowers.

meanings.definition: To mark or color with streaks or spots.
meanings.sent1: She brinded the wall with different shades of paint.
meanings.sent2: The artist brinded the canvas with bold strokes of color.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally brinded his shirt with ink while writing.
meanings.sent4: The chef brinded the dessert with a drizzle of chocolate sauce.
meanings.sent5: The gardener brinded the garden path with colorful stones.
